system-config.reset-email-subject: Fraud Shield TSO user account password reset
system-config.reset-email-content:
You recently requested to reset your password. Please click on the following link to reset your password. This link is time sensitive, it will be valid until EXPIRETIME
http://localhost:8090/FraudShield/servlet/home/passwordReset?resetCode=RESETCODE
Thanks
Fraud Shield LLC.

Regards
Fraud Shield LLC.
